description: This fried rice has smoky and salty flavours with simple ingredients.
name: Spinach & Egg Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g rice, cooked as per packet instructions

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large saucepan or wok to a medium heat and add 1 tablespoon of sesame oil.
Crack the eggs and fry for 4 minutes until cooked and then remove from the pan and set aside.
Add the rest of the oil to the pan and fry the onions, garlic and mushrooms for 4 minutes while tossing.
Cook the rice as per packet instructions and drain fully.
Add all ingredients to the pan and chop up the egg and combine everything while cooking together for 4 minute before serving.
